title: U.S. Job Growth Slows in Mixed Labor Picture
itunes:title: U.S. Job Growth Slows in Mixed Labor Picture
description:
Bloomberg Markets Correspondent Kriti Gupta and Bloomberg Intelligence Chief Industry Economist Carl Riccadonna discuss U.S. job growth registering its smallest gain this year while the unemployment rate fell by more than forecast to 4.2%. The Muse CEO Kathryn Minshew shares her thoughts on what’s happening within the Millennial and Gen Z workforce. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News U.S. Health Care Reporter Cynthia Koons share Cynthia's Businessweek Magazine story Whether or Not It’s a Game Changer, Omicron Is Covid’s Future. Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, discusses the emergence of the omicron variant in the U.S. Ben Armstrong, Founder of BitBoy Crypto, breaks down cryptocurrency investing and volatility.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
